scripts.dev1: cross-env branch=origin/master PORT=81 NODE_ENV=development nodemon --inspect --ignore node_modules/ --ignore dbFile/ --ignore log --ignore prettylist.js app
scripts.serve1: cross-env branch=origin/master PORT=81 NODE_ENV=production nodemon --inspect --ignore node_modules/ --ignore dbFile/ --ignore log --ignore prettylist.js app
scripts.dev: cross-env name=source_scripts branch=origin/master pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env development && pm2 logs
scripts.serve: cross-env name=source_scripts branch=origin/master pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production && pm2 logs
